original_text: They will take Zedekiah away to Babylon as their prisoner. He will stay there until the Lord has punished him completely. If you continue to fight against Babylon's army, you will never win.” ’ That was the Lord's message that Jeremiah had told Zedekiah.
korean_text: 그가 시드기야를 바벨론으로 끌어 가리니 시드기야는 내가 돌볼 때까지 거기에 있으리라 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 너희가 갈대아인과 싸울지라도 승리하지 못하리라 하셨다 하였더니

sentences.original_text: They will take Zedekiah away to Babylon
until the Lord has punished him completely
If you continue to fight against Babylon's army
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 바빌론 군대와 계속 싸운다면
당신은 결코 이길 수 없을 것이다
